SWIM: Scenario Weights for Importance Measurement 1 Overview 1.1 Installation

SWIM: Scenario Weights for Importance Measurement Silvana M. Pesenti University of Torontosilvana.pesenti@utoronto.ca Alberto Bettini Pietro Millossovich DEAMS, University of Trieste Cass Business School, City, University of LondonAndreas Tsanakas Cass Business School, City, University of London25 July 2019 1 Overview The SWIM package provides weights on simulated scenarios from a stochastic model, such that stressed model components (random variables) fulfil given probabilistic constraints (e.g. specified values for risk measures), under the new scenario weights. Scenario weights are selected by constrained minimisation of the relative entropy to the baseline model. 1.1 Installation The SWIM package can be install from CRAN : via the link https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=SWIM; alternatively from GitHub: with the following R code: install.packages("spesenti/SWIM")
